mapper.select: select * from img i where i.field like CONCAT('%', #{field}, '%') and i.id not in (select b.img_id from blog b where b.user_id = #{userId}) and !i.is_delete
select * from img i where i.user_id not in (select u.id from user u)
select i.md5, min(i.is_delete) iis_delete, max(i.url) as url, max(i.reduce_url) as reduce_url from img i group by i.md5 having iis_delete = 1
